name: OpenAI
summary: The industry standard for AI models. OpenAI provides the powerful GPT-4 API for complex reasoning, coding, and multimodal tasks, enabling developers to build sophisticated AI applications with state-of-the-art safety features.

name: ChatGPT
summary: The most versatile AI assistant available. ChatGPT excels at writing, coding, data analysis, and creative brainstorming. Its multimodal capabilities allow it to see, hear, and speak, making it the perfect daily driver for productivity.

name: Google Gemini
summary: Google's native multimodal AI assistant that integrates deeply with the Workspace ecosystem. Gemini processes vast amounts of information quickly and connects directly with Google Docs, Drive, and Gmail to streamline your workflow.

name: Anthropic (Claude)
summary: Known for having the largest context window and highly steerable models. Claude 3.5 Sonnet is currently a top-tier model for coding and nuanced writing, focusing on safety and reduced hallucinations compared to competitors.

name: DeepSeek
summary: A powerful open-source alternative for coding and reasoning. DeepSeek offers high-performance models that rival top proprietary LLMs but at a fraction of the inference cost, making it ideal for budget-conscious developers.

name: Perplexity AI
summary: Replaces traditional Google search with AI-curated answers. Perplexity scans the live web to provide accurate, cited summaries for complex questions, saving you hours of research time by filtering out SEO spam.

name: Midjourney
summary: The gold standard for AI image generation. Midjourney produces artistically stunning and photorealistic visuals that are currently unmatched in quality. Perfect for designers, marketers, and creatives needing high-fidelity assets.

name: Runway
summary: A full-stack AI creative suite for video. Runway pioneered text-to-video generation (Gen-2/Gen-3) and offers powerful tools like inpainting and motion brush, giving filmmakers complete control over AI-generated scenes.

name: ElevenLabs
summary: The most realistic AI voice generator on the market. ElevenLabs offers emotional, human-like text-to-speech and instant voice cloning, widely used for content creation, audiobooks, and dubbing in multiple languages.

name: Suno AI
summary: Generates radio-quality songs with full vocals and lyrics from simple text prompts. Suno is revolutionizing music creation, allowing anyone to produce tracks in any genre without musical training.

name: n8n
summary: The ultimate workflow automation tool for technical users. n8n offers a fair-code model that you can self-host, featuring deep AI integration to build autonomous agents and complex logic chains without vendor lock-in.

name: Make
summary: A visual powerhouse for connecting apps. Make allows you to build complex, branching automation scenarios with a drag-and-drop interface, perfect for connecting your AI models to thousands of other apps like Slack, Gmail, and Airtable.

name: Zapier
summary: The most accessible automation platform with the largest app ecosystem. Zapier's new AI features allow you to describe a workflow in plain English and have it built automatically, making automation accessible to everyone.

name: Cursor
summary: An AI-first code editor built on VS Code. Cursor understands your entire codebase, allowing for incredibly accurate code generation, smart refactoring, and bug fixing. It is widely considered the best editor for AI-assisted programming.

name: v0
summary: Vercel's generative UI tool. Describe an interface, and v0 generates production-ready React and Tailwind CSS code instantly. It speeds up the frontend prototyping process significantly.

name: GitHub Copilot
summary: The original AI pair programmer. Integrated directly into your IDE, Copilot suggests code completions in real-time, helping you write boilerplate faster and discover new APIs without leaving your editor.

name: Jasper AI
summary: An AI marketing platform designed for enterprise teams. Jasper learns your brand voice and style guide to generate on-brand blog posts, social media captions, and marketing emails that sound like you.

name: Copy.ai
summary: A versatile AI writing tool focused on sales and marketing workflows. Copy.ai excels at generating high-converting ad copy, cold outreach emails, and social media content at scale.

name: Grammarly
summary: More than just a spell checker. Grammarly's AI analyzes tone, clarity, and delivery to make your writing sharper and more professional across email, Slack, and documents.

name: Canva
summary: The all-in-one design platform now powered by 'Magic Studio'. Canva allows non-designers to generate images, remove backgrounds, and resize content instantly using AI, making professional design accessible to all.

name: Notion AI
summary: AI integrated directly into your workspace. Notion AI can summarize messy notes, generate action items from meeting transcripts, and brainstorm ideas without you ever leaving your document.

name: Otter.ai
summary: Your AI meeting assistant. Otter joins your Zoom, Teams, or Google Meet calls to record audio, transcribe conversations in real-time, and generate automatic summaries and action items.

name: Fireflies.ai
summary: A powerful AI notetaker that creates a searchable knowledge base from your voice conversations. It analyzes sentiment, speaker talk time, and key topics from your meetings.

name: Hugging Face
summary: The GitHub of AI. Hugging Face is the central hub for the open-source community, hosting hundreds of thousands of models and datasets, making it the go-to place for discovering and testing new AI technology.

name: LangChain
summary: The leading framework for building LLM applications. LangChain provides the tools to connect models to data sources, manage memory, and create complex chains of reasoning for building your own AI apps.

name: Pinecone
summary: A managed vector database built for scale. Pinecone is essential for building RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) applications, allowing AI models to search through your own data with high speed and accuracy.

name: Mistral
summary: Europe's leading AI lab providing highly efficient open-weight models. Mistral models are known for punching above their weight class in performance while being small enough to run cheaply or locally.

name: Cohere
summary: Enterprise-focused AI models specialized in business tasks. Cohere excels at search (embeddings) and classification, providing RAG-ready solutions that are secure and reliable for corporate use.

name: OpenRouter
summary: A unified interface for almost every LLM. OpenRouter allows you to access models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and Meta through a single standardized API, often at the best prices.

name: LlamaIndex
summary: The data framework for LLMs. LlamaIndex specializes in ingesting, structuring, and accessing private data so that your AI applications can actually 'read' and understand your documents.

name: Qdrant
summary: A high-performance open-source vector search engine. Qdrant is Rust-based, fast, and reliable, offering a great balance of filtering capabilities and vector similarity search for modern AI apps.

name: Weaviate
summary: An AI-native vector database. Weaviate stores both objects and vectors, allowing for hybrid search (keyword + semantic) to ensure your AI apps find the most relevant context every time.

name: Milvus
summary: Built for massive scale. Milvus is a cloud-native vector database designed to handle billions of vectors, making it the choice for large enterprises with enormous datasets.

name: QuillBot
summary: The ultimate paraphrasing tool. QuillBot helps you rewrite sentences to improve fluency, avoid plagiarism, or simplify complex text, making it an essential companion for students and writers.
